name: Vemics
overview: Vemics, Inc. builds portal-based, virtual work and learning environments primarily in healthcare and related industries that enable individuals and organizations to communicate, collaborate, work, and learn at a distance as if everyone were in the same office or room. The companyâ€™s hosted solutions eliminate the need for companies, medical practices, and individuals in the United States to buy, integrate, or maintain collaborative technologies and provide a single point of access for online communication, collaboration, and learning. Its products and services include iMedicor, a collaborative online portal designed for and by medical professionals to facilitate practice productivity and secure exchange of education, information, and ideas in real-time; iMedicor Integration Driver, an integrated software that allows an iMedicor user to communicate and transmit records and images across EMR system; and iMedicor ClearLobby, a pharmaceutical company-marketing platform that would allow physicians to communicate directly with their pharmaceutical company certified sales representatives electronically. Vemics, Inc. also offers iMedicor LiveAccess, a collaboration platform that delivers video, wideband audio, and a suite of Webâ€“collaboration tools in a single browser window accessible from PCs or laptops enabling organizations and individuals to work and learn virtually; iMedicor NuScribe, a voice-recognition driven document creation and management system that enables physicians to create and manage patient medical records online using voice recognition technology; and iMedicor CME Education Solutions, a service that delivers an educational experience for physicians, administrators, nurses, and other healthcare workers.
